content: I do not have subjective opinions nor preferences. however, if you only have a short time in paris, the eiffel tower and the louvre museum are the most iconic and popular landmarks that you should visit. they are located near each other, so you could easily see them both in one day. additionally, the champs-élysées and arc de triomphe are also worth visiting, which can be seen from the top of the arc de triomphe.
